headline: Are Wall Street Analysts Predicting Rockwell Automation Stock Will Climb or Sink?
summary: Rockwell Automation has outperformed the broader market over the past year, and analysts are moderately optimistic about the stock’s prospects.

headline: Rockwell Automation Cuts Maintenance Costs, Finds Savings for Canadian Supplier, Perth County Ingredients, with Fiix CMMS
summary: Rockwell Automation, the world's largest company dedicated to industrial automation and digital transformation, is pleased to announce that Perth County Ingredients (PCI), a leading supplier of dried egg products to global food, beverage and nutrition markets in Canada, has achieved dramatic reductions in maintenance workload, downtime and operational costs after implementing the Fiix® computerized maintenance management system (CMMS).

raw.headline: Rockwell Automation Cuts Maintenance Costs, Finds Savings for Canadian Supplier, Perth County Ingredients, with Fiix CMMS
raw.summary: Rockwell Automation, the world's largest company dedicated to industrial automation and digital transformation, is pleased to announce that Perth County Ingredients (PCI), a leading supplier of dried egg products to global food, beverage and nutrition markets in Canada, has achieved dramatic reductions in maintenance workload, downtime and operational costs after implementing the Fiix® computerized maintenance management system (CMMS).
